title: Looking For Duo bronze/silver
body: hey guys don't have anyone to duo with and would love to just slowly climb and build my skills. please add me if you're interested.

replies.body:
yo, IM YOUR MAN BRO, Hit me up whenever you play next IGN - Mullyplant94, 
lets carry eachother to gold and above ;)
add me, i play with you. mention about dou team so i know who you are in my team list
